# StreamExtensions.WriteUInt8 method

Writes an unsigned 8-bit value to the stream.

```csharp
public static void WriteUInt8(this Stream @this, byte value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| this | The stream to write to. |
| value | The value to write. |

## Remarks

This is not named `WriteByte` to avoid confusion with the existing `WriteByte` method contract on Stream.
